Flavio is a blacksmith content with living a quiet, uneventful life in a town mostly untouched by Lizardo's evil. But when the comet of prophecy lands on the outskirts of town, Flavio's destiny is immediately made clear. Around the peace-loving but brave Flavio. His arch-enemy Lizardo attempts to ruin the peace and harmony of their dwelling place, affecting the inhabitants. T.J. Hooker. Denny Crane. Big Giant Head. Alexander the Great. Henry V. Priceline’s Negotiator. These are but a handful of the innumerable masks worn by William Shatner over seven extraordinary decades onstage and in front of the camera. A peerless maverick thespian, electrifying performer, and international cultural treasure, Bill (as he prefers to be called), now 91 years young, is the living embodiment of his classic line “to boldly go where no man has gone before.” In unprecedented fashion, You Can Call Me Bill strips away all the masks he has worn to embody countless characters, revealing the man behind it all.","poster_path":"/58laDjeJTwPEOhViu0SmAHXiRha.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":4.577,"release_date":"2024-03-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.167,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":"/wQifhqbdmWNutXFZ9avlgqUSk0R.jpg","id":1181787,"title":"Un Caso Excepcional","original_title":"Un Caso Excepcional","overview":"A young actress arrives late to a casting, making up a great excuse without knowing a small detail.","poster_path":"/wNKZe4InOKSpXjsDeHWeknNS0pr.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[35,10749],"popularity":5.087,"release_date":"2023-03-22","video":false,"vote_average":9.4,"vote_count":5},{"backdrop_path":"/iZbl6fNMCe66FJtw6LA9HC7hiVs.jpg","id":306963,"title":"Wanderers","original_title":"Wanderers","overview":"Wanderers is a vision of humanity's expansion into the Solar System, based on scientific ideas and concepts of what our future in space might look like, if it ever happens. Without any apparent story, other than what you may fill in by yourself, the idea with the film is primarily to show a glimpse of the fantastic and beautiful nature that surrounds us on our neighboring worlds - and above all, how it might appear to us if we were there.","poster_path":"/2e1XbXF7tYIhtqTf587PQxImpDI.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[878,16],"popularity":6.763,"release_date":"2014-10-11","video":false,"vote_average":7.169,"vote_count":59}],"total_pages":2,"total_results":40}
